mapper.sql: select qna_no, title, category, registration_date, hits, content, member_id from qna
mapper.insert: insert into qna (qna_no, qna_title, qna_category, qna_registration_date, qna_hits, qna_content, member_id) values (#{number}, #{title}, #{category}, #{registrationDate}, #{hits}, #{content}, #{memberId})
